title: SyncCoordinator Cross-Tab Tests Complete
content:
Phase 2 SyncCoordinator cross-tab tests complete with 19 new tests validating:
- Position/Size sync lifecycle across tabs
- Cross-tab propagation of position and size updates
- Tab visibility state refresh when tabs switch
- Container-specific Quick Tab loading
- Rapid position updates maintaining consistency
- Concurrent updates from different tabs
- SaveId-based storage change filtering
- Message routing (CREATE, SOLO, MUTE, MINIMIZE, RESTORE, CLOSE)

All 1846 tests passing. Key insights from Perplexity research:
- Mock BroadcastChannel with controllable delivery timing
- Test message ordering, duplication, and loss scenarios
- Test coordinator election and leadership patterns
- Test tab lifecycle (open/close mid-sync)
- Test storage consistency before message handlers fire
